string.text:
Externally, the Heavy armour resembles an exoskeleton, but the first and main difference that is striking is the lack of servo drives on the arms and legs, as well as a battery behind the back. Due to this difference, the Heavy suit is lighter than an exoskeleton and also allows its owner to run. In all other parameters, the suit is identical to an exoskeleton, except that it has a little less protection from bullets and shrapnel explosions and provides the carrier with less protection from shocks. Despite its popularity, the costume has not found its name.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] extremely Heavy armor 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ARMOR CLASS:
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Head: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Eyes: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Chin: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Neck: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Torso: %c[0,170,170,170]V
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Shoulders: %c[0,170,170,170]V
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Hands: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Arms: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Thighs: %c[0,170,170,170]V
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Knees and shins: %c[0,170,170,170]V
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Feet: %c[0,170,170,170]V
 
%c[0,170,170,170]KEY FEATURES:
%c[0,100,0,15] Х %c[0,140,140,140] increased durability and carrying capacity

Externally, the heavy body armor resembles an exoskeleton, but the first and main difference that catches your eye is the absence of servos on the arms and legs, as well as the battery behind the back. Due to this difference, heavy body armor is lighter than an exoskeleton and also allows its wearer to run. In all other respects, the armored suit is identical to the exoskeleton, except that it has slightly less protection against bullets and shrapnel explosions and provides the wearer with less protection from impacts. Despite its popularity, the costume never got its name. Reinforced with additional armored inserts. 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] extremely Heavy armor

%c[0,170,170,170]KEY FEATURES:
%c[0,100,0,15] Х %c[0,140,140,140] increased protection

Externally, the heavy armour resembles an exoskeleton, but the first and main difference that is striking is the lack of a helmet and servo drives on the arms and legs, as well as a battery behind the back. Due to this difference, the heavy suit is lighter than an exoskeleton and also allows its owner to run. Despite its popularity, the costume has not found its name.

%c[0,100,0,15] Х %c[0,140,140,140] "Explosion protection" parameter is increased

Standard protoexo suit with M2 servo drives. In general, the protection is the same as that of a normal Zarya, but the weight to be carried is significantly increased. Compared to a conventional proto-exoskeleton, it has a higher weight, but also a higher payload and increased radiation protection. It is also much easier to run in.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Heavy armor
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] exoskeleton

%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Shoulders: %c[0,170,170,170]V

%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Feet: %c[0,170,170,170]V

The outfit combines a two-layer rubberized fabric with a plexiglass lining and an integrated flak jacket, as well as an additional unloading. Despite the fact that the body armor penetrates even with a pistol bullet, the suit is very popular because of its low cost and wide range of possibilities for improvement. Equipped with built-in fasteners for additional modules. Modified by bandit masters.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Light armor

%c[0,170,170,170]KEY FEATURE:
%c[0,100,0,15] Х %c[0,140,140,140] increased durability

Modification of the standard bulletproof vest CN-1 especially for marshy terrain. This flak jacket was developed for Search operations in areas with low anomalous activity. The use of relatively high quality materials has increased resistance to wear and tear. It has three built-in fasteners for additional modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Light armor

%c[0,170,170,170]KEY FEATURE:
%c[0,100,0,15] Х %c[0,140,140,140] increased number of mounting points for additional modules

Military armour isolating suit "Gagarin" designed for assault operations in extreme conditions of the Zone. It is equipped with an external insulating coating and a closed-loop breathing system, the main element of which is a modification of gas mask GP-17. Thanks to this solution it perfectly protects against abnormal influences. The basis of armor protection is a modification of vests series Fort Redut T7, which provides excellent protection against shell bullets and fragments, while not reducing the mobility of the owner. Despite the excellent protective properties in terms of stalkers has the following drawbacks: low carrying weight. It has 3 slots for additional modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] reinforced armor
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ARMOR CLASS:
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Torso: %c[0,170,170,170]IV

%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Feet: %c[0,170,170,170]IV

A simple piece of fabric wrapped mask. It is often used by Stalkers to prevent dangerous particles from entering the body, as a precautionary measure. It is recommended to wear it even if the Geiger counter is not signaled, as air can be contaminated to some extent. However, it can also accumulate toxins over a longer period of time, so it is always advisable to have a spare one for quick replacement.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] cloth mask
%c[255,238,153,26] Х %c[0,140,140,140] usage: %c[0,170,170,170] Equipment repair, weapon maintenance (+4%)
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] single layer of solid fabric %c[0,170,170,170]224g

A simple piece of camouflaged fabric wrapped mask. It is often used by Stalkers to prevent dangerous particles from entering the body, as a precautionary measure. It is recommended to wear it even if the Geiger counter is not signaled, as air can be contaminated to some extent. However, it can accumulate toxins over a long period of time, so it is always advisable to have a spare one for quick replacement.

Standard gas mask designed for filtration of radioactive dust and toxic substances from the air. It is widely used by both beginners and veterans of the Freedom group because of its functional irreplaceability. It is not equipped with protection against bullets, fragments and mechanical influences. Painted in camouflage.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Light gas mask 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] PBF gas mask %c[0,170,170,170]760g
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] 2х filters EO-19 %c[0,170,170,170]210g
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ARMOR CLASS:
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Head: %c[0,170,170,170]none
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Eyes: %c[0,170,170,170]I
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Chin: %c[0,170,170,170]none
%c[0,93,0,116] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Neck: %c[0,170,170,170]none

Rubber mask, used to filter air from radioactive particles and toxic substances. This old model is still widely used by new recruits and veterans of all groups due to its versatility, functionality and cheapness. It is not equipped with protection against bullets, fragments and mechanical influences. Painted in camouflage.

Old Soviet men's cotton paddy. Cheap and extremely easy to manufacture cotton jacket, the most popular winter outerwear in the USSR, has always been a symbol of functional clothing, where the aesthetics has given way to purely pragmatic considerations. Initially, two fasteners for additional modules were installed.

Long brown camping cape. Looks old and worn, many patches and Seams testify to numerous repairs. It is best used with a gas mask or closed breathing system. Initially, a single fixture was installed for additional modules.

%c[0,170,170,170]Just a common sunglasses. Darken the image slightly. Fashionable and brutal. 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] accessory

%c[0,170,170,170]The most common glasses in polymer frames. 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] accessory

An ordinary army Berill-5M, which was factory fitted with servo drives behind the perimeter. Unlike exoskeleton, it allows running and does not contain a built-in helmet. Contains a built-in container for fixing the modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] Х %c[0,140,140,140] Exoskeleton

%c[0,170,170,170]KEY FEATURE:
%c[0,100,0,15] Х %c[0,140,140,140] "Impact dampening" parameter is increased

%c[0,170,170,170]Tactical steel helmet, actually a repainted M40 steel helmet. Manufactured in Russia. Does not provide protection against anomalies or radiation, but is capable of deflecting a tangentially flown bullet. He was in demand in the Zone only during the period of the first wars between factions.

%c[0,170,170,170]Tactical steel helmet, actually a repainted M40 steel helmet with respirator. Manufactured in Russia. Provide protection against radiation, capable of deflecting a tangentially flown bullet. He was in demand in the Zone only during the period of the first wars between factions.
